column4: Anyone know how to change the mime association of a file?  It appears to be an issue with the underlying system and not nautilus directly.
right click, properties, change the open with
no, that is not the issue.  The issue is that *.java is mapped to text/x-csrc

What that means is that when Nautilus goes to muck around with java files it prevents anything from happening automatically (like opening them with a text editor) because the contents and the mime type do not match.
